channel.title: Ecto nerds

item.title: Ecto nerds
item.dc:creator: @_SLAYER [SLAYER]
item.description:
@_SLAYER wrote:

How do i make so that you need 10 of an item to get a prize? So far this is my code, i know it is wrong it is just an example of what i want:

case 1686: //GHOST DISPLE if (c.IsItemInBag(4251, 10) && c.startedEcto == 1) { c.ectoRewards(); c.addItem(995, 100000); c.deleteItem(4251, c.getItemSlot(4251), 10); } else if (c.startedEcto == 1) { c.sendMessage("You don't have all 10 ectophial yet!"); } else { c.ectoHelp(); c.statedEcto = 1; } break;
See where it says, 4251, 10 thats what i need fixed.

Read full topic
